Text: Thank You. Nice Album artwork. Nice work Andew Esao!!!!
Absolutely amazing band, amazing guys. Be sure to support the band by buying the album when it's released!
I had a feeling this would be up before it even released. Awesome! Gotta love Circa Survive.
Also definitely support the band. Anthony and his wife has gone through enough before finally being blessed with James.
thanks to the uploader as always, BUT. this is pretty low quality audio... .flac possible?

I will see about upgrading the quality when I myself get the chance to buy the real thing. My place a 320kbps or Flac. If you have any bands you want thats the same genre am up for putting the effort to get it.

Not to rain on anybody's parade, but this seems like a reconvert from lower bit-rate. To my sensitive ears it sounds like the cymbals are hissing. Everything on the treble range has slight hiss, which is evidence of low bit-rate. Still, props to the uploader for getting this. Does anyone have a CD rip?
Wasn't converted on my side. In all honest this was all from youtube since it was first leaked there. I tried to find the best sounding videos but it's definitely not a CD rip.
No prob, DevilBloody, thanks for the release, anywho. A true pirate gentelman.
